Building Bridges to a Stronger Community

The Cornerstone Community Development Corporation (Cornerstone) is a faith-based 501(c) (3), non-profit organization, serving Bergen County, New Jersey, whose purpose is to meet the needs in the community through entrepreneurship, partnership, and education.
